hypothesis_content.title: Stress Regime Volatility Spike Fade
hypothesis_content.statement: When market enters STRESS regime (confidence > 70%) and BTC 10-day realized volatility spikes above its 90-day rolling 90th percentile, selling volatility (short Vega) at open of next trading day will be profitable as volatility mean-reverts within 5-8 days, provided no continuation of stress-triggering event.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extreme volatility spikes in stress regimes are often overreactions. News about 'high volatility risks spreading' suggests contagion fears may create overshoot. Market makers and institutions rebalance after initial panic.
entry_conditions: Volatility spike occurred within last 2 trading days
No major news catalyst in past 24 hours

exit_conditions.take_profit: 10-day realized volatility drops below 75th percentile OR 8 days elapsed
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Volatility increases another 15% from entry level

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If volatility continues expanding beyond 15% additional increase, or if STRESS regime persists beyond 10 days.
